title: My game is stuttering and is only putting out 52-54 FPS!!!
body: I have a GTX 970 4GB and have had this problem for months. I ended up stop playing sadly, because the stutter is so bad I end up losing every game. I was wondering if anyone knew what the problem might be I have tried repairing the game and reinstalling it as well, still nothing works. Any ideas?

replies.body:
Since you've already tried repairing the client, this could be more of an issue where you missed a driver or other software update. If your graphics card driver is out of date, it could start to cause issues with your FPS if it's not able to render everything properly. Follow the steps in our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) to cover all of your bases.

Hit me back up if you have any questions.
